Class Scene

java.lang.Object
scene.Scene
public class Scene extends Object
The Scene class represents a 3D scene with a name, background color, ambient light, and geometries. It provides methods to set the background color, ambient light, and geometries of the scene.

  • Field Details

    • name

      public String name
      The name of the scene.

    • background

      public Color background
      The background color of the scene. Default is black.

    • ambientLight

      public AmbientLight ambientLight
      The ambient light of the scene. Default is no ambient light.

    • geometries

      public Geometries geometries
      The geometries in the scene. Default is an empty set of geometries.
